articles.title: How is Donald Trump reacting to January 6 hearings? - CNN Video
articles.description: According to sources, former President Donald Trump is "always watching" the January 6 committee hearings. CNN's Kristen Holmes reports how he is reacting to the hearings and the current state of his relationship with long time adviser, Roger Stone, since the…

articles.title: Dr. Fauci explains why new Covid variant is concerning - CNN Video
articles.description: Dr. Anthony Fauci tells CNN's John Berman he is concerned about the new Covid variant BA.5 and says it's time to mask up indoors as the variant increases the likelihood of reinfection for people that have already been infected with the virus.

articles.author: Danielle Wiener-Bronner, CNN Business
articles.title: Here's what's getting more expensive at the grocery store
articles.description: Food prices are still on the rise, but some relief may be on the horizon.

articles.author: By David Williams, CNN
articles.title: Passengers rushed off flight in Denver after reports of smoke and fire
articles.description: Passengers aboard a United Airlines flight from Kansas City, Missouri, to Denver, Colorado, had to be rushed off the plane on Tuesday after reports of smoke and fire under the aircraft, according to a statement from Denver International Airport.
articles.content: CNN's Pete Muntean contributed to this report.Top image: United Airlines planes parked at gates at Denver International Airport in an April 8, 2021, file photo. (Elijah Nouvelage/Bloomberg/Getty Imag… [+2 chars]

articles.author: Eliza Mackintosh, CNN
articles.title: The 'worst variant' is here
articles.description: Omicron offshoot BA.5 is now dominating US infections, proving the pandemic is far from over.
articles.content:

articles.author: Nectar Gan
articles.title: Shanghai fears new lockdown as millions test for Covid amid sweltering heat
articles.description: Millions of Shanghai residents braved sweltering heat Tuesday to wait in line for compulsory Covid tests, as growing case numbers and the emergence of a highly infectious Omicron subvariant spurred new fears of a return to mass lockdown.
articles.content: Millions of Shanghai residents braved sweltering heat Tuesday to wait in line for compulsory Covid tests, as growing case numbers and the emergence of a highly infectious Omicron subvariant spurred n… [+3176 chars]

articles.author: Deidre McPhillips, CNN
articles.title: Drug-resistant infections and deaths among hospital patients grew amid Covid-19 pandemic
articles.description: Years of progress the United States had made in fighting drug-resistant infections were largely erased during the Covid-19 pandemic, with hospital-acquired infections and resulting deaths growing 15% in 2020.

articles.author: Kaitlan Collins, Katherine Dillinger and Paul LeBlanc, CNN
articles.title: US officials working on a plan to allow second Covid-19 boosters for all adults
articles.description: US health officials are urgently working on a plan to allow second Covid-19 boosters for all adults, a senior White House official confirmed to CNN on Monday.

articles.author: Katia Hetter, CNN
articles.title: Expert explains how to protect yourself against the recent Covid surges
articles.description: The much-awaited summer lull in coronavirus cases doesn't appear to be happening. CNN Medical Analyst Dr. Leana Wen offers her insights about what precautions to take as infections continue to increase in much of the United States.

articles.author: Deidre McPhillips, CNN
articles.title: Undercounted Covid-19 cases leave US with a blind spot as BA.5 variant becomes dominant
articles.description: Official Covid-19 case metrics severely undercount the true number of infections, leaving the United States with a critical blind spot as the most transmissible coronavirus variant yet takes hold.
